column2: These events have been determined to not be worth inclusion in the main Curated tab at this time. They could be in need of further information and may be moved over later, or could just be bad. Read the comments for more detail.

column7:
Was it worth the price?
Opinions are biased (check comments)

column8: Fee is per category and event mostly exists on twitter. Very little exposure for the price.
Las Vegas, NV, USA physical expo and awards. Very expensive, probably not worth it except for high-budget games that have already had a mainstream release.
Very expensive. Little to no exposure for the price and no featuring on Steam.
